title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 4.21 - 11/12/2014
body:
Summoners,

On 11/12/2014, starting at 02:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 4.21. At 04:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

The patch will be approximately 290MB.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.


EDIT:
Hey guys in case you have not seen them yet, the patch notes are out. http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-421-notes

-ToxicHawk

replies.body:
FINALLY! 
Man, i gotta say, the wait for patch 4.21 has been the most tantalizing wait this year. :)
so much cool stuff to look forward to
The patch notes aren't up yet, they will be coming in the next few days.
Thanks! I'm guessing that means tomorrow since the patch notes usually arrive before the maintenance.
So are there patch notes on the website or am I going to have to jump on S@20?
This is one of those questions that could of been answered by the asker but the asker was just lazy =.=

I'm not lazy, I looked for the patch notes and could not find them. I considered the possibility that someone at Riot was just lazy and had not posted the notes yet so I came here to ask if they were supposed to be up yet.
You could of just changed the 0 to 1 in http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-420-notes and that would of worked if they were up yet so yes you are lazy.
So taking a few minutes to come here and ask, after looking for the patch notes, rather than spending a few seconds changing something in a URL is lazy?
Surrender@20 get the patch notes when they are posted on the site just like everyone else. So if they aren't on the site, then no patch notes on Surrender@20.
Doesn't mean I can't check PBE 4.21

> Doesn't mean I can't check PBE 4.21

So go do that then?
Already have. ToxicHawk did say the patch notes aren't on the website yet.
That's good to check in between PBE cycles, but not when official patch notes are coming.

Next time could you please give warning ahead of time (in the client) :(    It freaks me out that i suddenly disconnect from servers and then I think somethings wrong with my internet.  

Seems like a good patch, but buffing {{champion:157}} Yasuo (he is mobile enough and him spamming q more often is a bad thing for the opposing team ) big no no in my opinion. thank you for your time

>buffing {{champion:157}} Yasuo (he is mobile enough and him spamming q more often is a bad thing for the opposing team ) big no no in my opinion. thank you for your time

Yasuo’s been weak enough after his nerfs. His win rate has been far under 50%. He deserves these buffs to get him back on the line. These buffs aren’t that crazy anyway.

I’m just glad WW’s getting nerfed, but I still don’t think it’s enough xDD

Also, it says it starts patching at 6AM (NZ time, 4AM AU time) and my client is now patching while saying the server is online. It says the patch will take 6 hours (battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours) and it only took 3 and a half hours? That’s a huge improvement from what I remember patches being
